Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1905406999479984128/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Meta Title Writing"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1905406999479984128/)_"
---
My SEO focus keyword IS [PROMPT]
My blog post title:	[PROMPT]	
		
The guidelines:		
- Meta title should contain my SEO focus keyword		
- Meta title should be between 50 and 60 characters		
- Add brackets or parenthesis, (here's what to do), [Beginners] depending on the information I gave you		
- Add question mark if relevant		
- Add an odd number (for listicles) if relevant		
- Add the current year if relevant	
- Write by [TARGETLANGUAGE]
		
Please give me 5 meta titles and description, at least two meta titles should be questions
